summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 2303, for the improvement of the alley in block 62, A. A. Denny's 5th Addition, being the alley running from Seneca Street to University Street and between 6th Avenue and 7th Avenue, all in the City of Seattle, by paving the same with vitrified brick laid upon a proper concrete foundation, and by grading and providing for the necessary surface drainage, under Ordinance No. 23885 and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
